DOC.brief_summary: Background : The aim prospective study evaluate effect magnesium reversal rocuronium-induced neuromuscular block sugammadex . Methods : Eighty patient , age 18 60 year , American Society Anesthesiologists I-II , undergo elective gynecological surgery enrol . Anaesthesia induce propofol fentanyl maintain 60 % nitrous oxide Oxygen sevoflurane . The magnesium group receive 50 milligram/kilogram ( mg/kg ) Magnesium intravenous ( iv ) bolus 15 mg/kg/hour continuous infusion completion surgery . The placebo group receive equivalent volume isotonic saline . For intubation , 0.6 mg/kg rocuronium administer 0.1 mg/kg add Train four ( TOF ) count reached 1 procedure . At end surgery TOF count 1 , 4 mg/kg sugammadex iv administer . Patients observe TOF ratio 0.9 achieve . Patient-controlled analgesia intravenous morphine use postoperatively .
